animeDescription: Bundled with the limited editions of 29th, 30th, and 31st volumes of the Hoozuki no Reitetsu manga.OVA 3 will be streamed in advance on September 1, 2020. OVA 3 will officially be released with volume 31 of the manga on September 23 2020.
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Hoozuki no Reitetsu', 'Other: Hoozuki no Reitetsu 2nd Season: Sono Ni']
